WorkItem.Description:
Hi.

I am trying to use this library to draw Control Flow Graphs.

So, I would need to have Vertex and Edge with a unique ID. Is that possible?

Also, when I just copy the code of TestWindow.xaml from the Sample in the package, it loses the Rectangle around each vertex? Can anyone tell me why?
How can I customize the shape of a single vertex?

Thanks
daniela

Comments.Message: We need a tutorial for vertex / edge customization... We got some good examples in the forums.
